metadata.Title: CVE-2023-40481 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
[Unknown description]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-40481` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

7zip - 23.01+dfsg-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 7zip package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '23.01+dfsg-3').
